content: What you do likely is the only way. I don't think putting Subject contains at the top would have any effect on the filter's efficiency, if that's what you're after.
creator: siffemoz

content: If you have forgotten password, you need to contact your email provider.

content: Have you read the info on the spamhaus page? That often tells how to resolve the problem. The details are important. Here is a generic page on resolving spamhaus blocks. https://bobcares.com/blog/spamhaus-blocking-outgoing-mail/ It doesn't apply specifically to your error but may offer help.
creator: davidsk
